trans-unit.source: Contains identification and initialization information about a <xref href="System.Activities.BookmarkScope"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 id 및 초기화 정보를 포함 한 <xref href="System.Activities.BookmarkScope"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the unique identifier for the <xref href="System.Activities.BookmarkScope"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 고유 식별자를 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Activities.BookmarkScope"> </xref>합니다.
에 대 한 고유 식별자는 <xref href="System.Activities.BookmarkScope"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Activities.BookmarkScope"></xref> has been initialized.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다 여부는 <xref href="System.Activities.BookmarkScope"> </xref> 활성화 되었습니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Activities.BookmarkScope"></xref> has been initialized; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref href="System.Activities.BookmarkScope"> </xref> 초기화 받지 않았으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that uniquely identifies the <xref href="System.Activities.BookmarkScope"></xref> when the <xref href="System.Activities.BookmarkScope"></xref> is in an uninitialized state.
trans-unit.target: 고유 하 게 식별 하는 값을 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Activities.BookmarkScope"> </xref> 때는 <xref href="System.Activities.BookmarkScope"> </xref> 초기화 되지 않은 상태입니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Activities.BookmarkScope> is initialized, the returned value is `null`.
A value that uniquely identifies the <xref href="System.Activities.BookmarkScope"></xref> when the <xref href="System.Activities.BookmarkScope"></xref> is in an uninitialized state.
trans-unit.target: 고유 하 게 식별 하는 값은 <xref href="System.Activities.BookmarkScope"> </xref> 때는 <xref href="System.Activities.BookmarkScope"> </xref> 초기화 되지 않은 상태입니다.
